Subject: Last day of Course Advising & Registration without Fine
Last day to drop course(s) with 100% adjustable refund
Last day to apply for Grade Change of a course (if any) of Spring 2025 Semester.Note: No application will be considered after the deadline
Last day of Course Advising & Registration with a Fine of Tk. 500/-Last day of Grade Submission of Incomplete Grades of Spring 2025 Semester by concerned Department/Program Office
Last day to drop course(s) with 50% adjustable refund
1stinstallment: A fine of Tk. 500/- will be imposed if 25% Tuition Fee and Semester Fee is not paid within this date.Transportation fee, if applicable, must be paid in full (no installment)
2ndinstallment:  A fine of Tk. 500/- will be imposed if 50% Tuition Fee and Semester Fee is not paid within this date
3rdinstallment:  A fine of Tk. 500/- will be imposed if 75% Tuition Fee and Semester Fee is not paid within this date
4thinstallment:  A fine of Tk. 500/- will be imposed if 100% Tuition Fee and Semester Fee is not paid within this date
Classes will remain suspended for exam preparation
